reviewText: This series is so well-done. Beautiful costumes, good music and singing, fun storyline. Taught my daughter to love music as she learned nursery rhymes. Just fun.
These are just simple stories, I loved them when I was young. A DVD and Blu-Ray release so we can pass them on to our children and their children.
I bought this for my grandson, my daughters watched it when they were little, he loves it too.  I just wish they still made it and I could have bought a DVD.

My order was fulfilled but the outside case said Mother Goose Treasury Volumes III and IV.  And the video when pulled out said III & IV but the tape played Vol. I&II.  So I am pleased that I recieved I and II but it's a little hard to decide which one is I&II and III & IV becuase the tape is labled wrong.
I remember watching this when I was little and wanted my little girl to love watching it to and she does! IT is truely a classic and Im glad to pass some of my childhood to hers.

I was so excited to receive this video.  Watched over and over as a child.  Was giving to my mom for Christmas.  The roller on the inside of the video is broken off and rattling in the case.  Movie will not play!!!!  Very dissapointed.

I remember this from when i was a kid.  Sure the puppets are kind of annoying sometimes, and mother goose losing her glasses gets old, but it's very colorful and entertaining.  They have very decent acting for a kid's video, and the way they present the nursery rhymes/put it into one big story is fun.  I'm glad my mom got it for us all those years ago... its probably one of the best videos i remember from childhood.
